title: Simple Past Or Present Perfect Tense

questions.question: He ...................................... absent since Monday.
questions.description: We use the present perfect to talk about an action or situation that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: Look. Somebody ......................................... their wallet on the table.
questions.description: We use the present perfect to talk about recently finished actions and events.

questions.question: ....................................... Janaki yesterday?
questions.description: The present perfect cannot be used with past time expressions like yesterday.

questions.question: I can't open the suitcase because I ........................................ the key.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about past events whose effect is still felt in the present.

questions.question: Although I rang the bell six times, nobody ...................................... the door.
questions.description: The past simple is used to talk about finished events that are in no way related to the present.

questions.question: I ............................................. college last year.
questions.description: The present perfect cannot be used with past time expressions like yesterday.

questions.question: I never .......................................... my grandfather because he had died before I was born.
This is the first time I ....................................... an opera.
questions.description: The present perfect is common with the expression 'this is the first / second / last etc.'

questions.question: You can't see her now because she ........................................
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about past events whose effect is still felt in the present.

questions.question: He can't walk because he ....................................... his leg.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about past events whose effect is still felt in the present.

questions.question: I have known him since we ........................................ at university together.
